data.title: Best Korean Movies II (TEARJERKING / MELANCHOLY)
data.meta_description:
One stop for:

*Sad Korean Movies *Sad Korean Drama *Sad Asian Movies and Drama

I'm a very huge fanatic of this genre... Asians are the masters of melancholies... some are real tearjerkers and some are really heartbreaking ...  Being a lover of asian drama I've included some top class korean & Japanese drama'... I don't like to make a separate list for drama'.. So it is now here...See what I saw, feel what I felt,cry like I cried and love like I loved...

 Check out My other lists:

1.Best Korean Movies I (http://www.imdb.com/list/nMV6Qx6aywI/)

2.Best Korean Movies II (TEARJERKING / MELANCHOLY) (http://www.imdb.com/list/xtEH3J-29pU/)

3.Best Korean Movies III (ACTION) (http://www.imdb.com/list/HSn5PJmmYRk/)

4.Best Korean Movies IV (CRIME/THRILLERS/MYSTERY) (http://www.imdb.com/list/-Y0iE_1Zvt4/)

5.Best Korean Movies V (ROMANTIC COMEDY) (http://www.imdb.com/list/wEdQPLPu8vU/)

Can't find in IMDb:

Full House (2004 TV series) Glass Slipper (Korean Drama - 2002) Taste Sweet Love (Korean Drama - 2004)

100% tears guaranteed
data.text:
Jae-Kyung (Hyun-Bin ) is a tough guy, who is a high school senior,If he turns 19 years means, he could be a millionaire by inheriting his deceased grandfather's wealth. Unfortunately his family lawyer informs Jae-Kyung about the will from his grandfather. In his will grandfather stated he can only become a millionaire after he graduates from Boram High School,a countryside local school. He has no other choice to avoid. Life became worse there and he can't use his money or make friends. In his class, he meets Eun-Hwan (Lee Yeon-Hee)a pretty girl. She's some kind of different from others. Things change Jae-Kyung's mind and became close to their new friends. Eventually he fell in love with Eun-Hwan and things become strong after he knows about her secrets.

A man's failed suicide attempt enables him to see ghosts, who later keep following him everywhere. It is now up to him to fulfill their wishes to make them go away.

"K" loves Cream but has terminal cancer so he keeps his love for her secret and tries to find a mate for her before he dies so she will not be alone after he dies.

Beautiful student Su-Eun prevents her fellow student Su-Ho to drown in the ocean. Su-Ho however, does not know who saved him, until Su-Eun tells him after a while. The love between them starts to grow, seemingly infinite. But then something terrible happens.

A man and a woman meet in the hospital after their respective partners are involved in a car accident. After learning that their spouses have been having an affair, the two begin one of their own.

Min is a Korean boy moves to Japan with his father who is a potter. One day at a local shrine, he meets Nanae, a beautiful Japanese girl with stunning eyes who is aspiring to be a painter. Min falls in love at first sight and finds out that Nanae attends the school to which he has just transferred. Their friendship develops fast despite their cultural and language difference. When Min's grandmother falls ill, Min returns to Korea and Nanae is nowhere to be found. Had his true feelings for Nanae not been apparent to her? Why has Nanae disappeared without a word?
